answers.answer: VL prior to treatment is used to confirm the presence of the virus.   during and after treatment docs use VL to judge treatment success.  with the PCR tests my viral loads tend to be about 2 to 3 million which i guess you can say is moderately hight.   i have also had less sensitive  BDNA viral load test and the viral load would run in the hundreds of thousands.  before treatment viral loads may fluctuate rapidly.   i have seen 800,000 used as a cut off between high and low viral loads.  as far as disease progression is concerned viral load seems to have very little use.  treatment success may be greater with lower viral loads, but other factors are probably more significant e.g. stage, diabetes, BMI, IL28blessingseric
